rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative directly modifying a risk-adjective.
statement_text: 'We are working closely with all of our suppliers to ensure eggs remain available for our customers and we are providing support to the industry in responding to the avian flu cases in Victoria,' a Coles spokesperson said.
